items.content_html: Fast, lightweight and fully typesafe web framework
items.title: metebykl/spectra: Fast, lightweight and fully typesafe web framework

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript utility for parsing, constructing, normalizing, and manipulating URLs. Supports both browser and Node.js environments
items.title: le-pepe/url-helper: A lightweight JavaScript utility for parsing, constructing, normalizing, and manipulating URLs. Supports both browser and Node.js environments

items.title: ikarthikng/zipcodes-us: Fast, lightweight US ZIP code lookup library providing city, state, county, and geographic coordinates with TypeScript support

items.content_html: Building a lightweight Node.js web framework like Express.
items.title: BaoDuong254/nodejs-web-framework: Building a lightweight Node.js web framework like Express.

items.content_html: NumPix is a lightweight and efficient handwritten digit recognition app powered by Spring Boot and TensorFlow. Simply draw a digit (0-9) on the web canvas, and NumPix will predict it instantly using a deep learning model trained on the MNIST dataset.
items.title: AyushPrakash414/NumPix-: NumPix is a lightweight and efficient handwritten digit recognition app powered by Spring Boot and TensorFlow. Simply draw a digit (0-9) on the web canvas, and NumPix will predict it instantly using a deep learning model trained on the MNIST dataset.

items.content_html: AnjuJS is a lightweight and efficient library for password encryption. It allows you to create custom encryption systems with salt, preferences, and a security key. It offers fast, secure encryption that is easy to implement, ideal for developers looking for a flexible and high-performance solution for managing passwords.
items.title: Shadouuh/Anju-JS: AnjuJS is a lightweight and efficient library for password encryption. It allows you to create custom encryption systems with salt, preferences, and a security key. It offers fast, secure encryption that is easy to implement, ideal for developers looking for a flexible and high-performance solution for managing passwords.

items.content_html: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.
items.title: l7aromeo/meocord: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.

items.content_html: A lightweight canvas library for 2D.
items.title: nashaofu/grender: A lightweight canvas library for 2D.

items.content_html: A lightweight, focused starting point for prototyping/building on the Superchain
items.title: ethereum-optimism/superchain-starter: A lightweight, focused starting point for prototyping/building on the Superchain

items.content_html: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

items.content_html: A high-precision NTP client implementation in TypeScript, designed for Alpine Linux environments, fully compliant with RFC 5905. Optimized for lightweight Docker containers with security features and real-time clock synchronization.
items.title: valorisa/ntp-client-requester: A high-precision NTP client implementation in TypeScript, designed for Alpine Linux environments, fully compliant with RFC 5905. Optimized for lightweight Docker containers with security features and real-time clock synchronization.

items.content_html: A lightweight Docker UI build for the web.
items.title: Olingo-dev/Olingo: A lightweight Docker UI build for the web.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.
items.title: waiz3ple/fractionability: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.

items.content_html: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.
items.title: bwlange/sym-pick: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.

items.content_html: Validate math expressions in JavaScript and TypeScript. Fast, lightweight, and accurate.
items.title: Kledenai/mathcheck: Validate math expressions in JavaScript and TypeScript. Fast, lightweight, and accurate.

items.content_html: ultra lightweight, robust frontend micro- library
items.title: kenseitehdev/MokshaJS: ultra lightweight, robust frontend micro- library

items.content_html: A lightweight tool for writing clean and succinct HTTP APIs with NestJS that encourages the REPR design pattern, code colocation, and the Single Responsibility Principle.
items.title: rhyek/nestjs-endpoints: A lightweight tool for writing clean and succinct HTTP APIs with NestJS that encourages the REPR design pattern, code colocation, and the Single Responsibility Principle.

items.content_html: Fast and lightweight Indian postal code (PIN) lookup library with hierarchical location data - states, districts, sub-districts, and coordinates. Zero dependencies and full TypeScript support.
items.title: ikarthikng/postalcodes-india: Fast and lightweight Indian postal code (PIN) lookup library with hierarchical location data - states, districts, sub-districts, and coordinates. Zero dependencies and full TypeScript support.
